xxl.core.indexStructures
Class BTree

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree
          xxl.core.indexStructures.BTree
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiDiskBTree
public class BTree
extends ORTree

This class implements a B+Tree. For a detailed discussion see Douglas Comer: "The Ubiquitous B-Tree", ACM Comput. Surv. 11(2), 121-137, 1979.

Nested Class Summary
 class BTree.Node
          Node is the class used to represent leaf- and non-leaf nodes of BTree.

Description copied from class: ORTree
Creates a new Node which does not have any information except its level.

Specified by:

Parameters:

computeDescriptor

public Descriptor computeDescriptor(Collection collection)
Description copied from class: ORTree
Computes the union of the descriptors of the collection's entries. The method ORTree.descriptor(Object) is used to determine the descriptors of these entries.

Overrides:
computeDescriptor in class ORTree
Parameters:
collection - a collection of objects
Returns:
the union of the descriptors of the collection's entries
See Also:
ORTree.descriptor(Object)

                                     Comparator comparator)
Gets a suitable Converter to serialize the tree's entries.

Parameters:
borderConverter - a converter to convert borders
comparator - a comparator for data objects stored in the tree
Returns:
a converter for entries of the tree

nodeConverter

public Converter nodeConverter(Converter objectConverter,
                               Converter borderConverter,
                               Comparator comparator)
Gets a suitable Converter to serialize the tree's nodes.

Parameters:
objectConverter - a converter to convert the data objects stored in the tree
borderConverter - a converter to convert borders
comparator - a comparator for data objects stored in the tree
Returns:
a NodeConverter
